## About this website

This is where I put all the useful information I keep on forgetting. Instead of googling the same things over and over, wasting time and server energy I put them here. It's like a second memory, better than my hippocampus, my [hippocamPLUS](https://jmonlong.github.io/Hippocamplus/assets/chandler-lol.gif)...
